OurTeamSection.title: Our Team

BrandingHero.slogan: Your image says a lot about you; make sure it's the right one.
BrandingHero.prosubtitle: Artistic devotion and rigor used to develop the essence of your brand
BrandingHero.maParraf: This is a fundamental part of branding for any entity launching and positioning itself in the market. Its goal is to ensure visual identity remains consistent over time, building a solid and cohesive brand.

SocialMediaHero.slogan: We offer an integrated Content Marketing strategy. We design and create relevant, creative content that builds a meaningful connection with your target audience. As a digital marketing agency, our commitment is to leverage the advantages of social media to amplify the value your brand offers.
SocialMediaHero.prosubtitle: We align with current trends and the audience your brand needs
SocialMediaHero.poParraf: We put all our ingenuity and dedication into developing content that is not only eye-catching but also projects a solid brand from day one. For us, the key lies in how we tell your story through design.
SocialMediaHero.poPreg: Shall we discuss your next big step on social media?
SocialMediaHero.griParraf: Customized strategies that reflect your brand's unique values. We develop the copy for every post, covering a wide range of content formats.

CookieBanner.message: We use cookies to improve your experience. By accepting, you consent to the use of tracking technologies according to our

s1.title: Introduction
s1.text: At 3R Core Marketing Agency, we are committed to providing personal data owners with the highest level of security and protecting the confidentiality of their information. Therefore, business relationships are conducted in a secure server environment under SSL (Secure Socket Layer) protocol, which keeps information encrypted and safe. This protocol is currently used by the world's leading companies for secure electronic transactions. This website has been created and designed to provide all relevant information and to establish a communication space with data owners.

s2.title: Objective and Purpose
s2.text: At 3R Core Marketing Agency, we are concerned with providing personal data owners with the highest level of security and protecting the confidentiality of their information.
s2.quote: Business relationships are conducted in a secure server environment under the SSL (Secure Socket Layer) protocol, which keeps information encrypted and secure.

s3.title: Legislation
s3.intro: This policy is governed by Peruvian legislation and specifically by:
s3.law1: Law No. 29733 - Personal Data Protection Law.
s3.law2: Supreme Decree No. 003-2013-JUS, Regulation of Law No. 29733.
s3.footer: In accordance with Law No. 29733 - Personal Data Protection Law and its Regulation approved by Supreme Decree No. 003-2013-JUS, personal data is any numerical, alphabetical, graphic, photographic, acoustic information, about personal habits or any other type that refers to a natural person that identifies them or makes them identifiable through means that can reasonably be used. Likewise, personal data processing refers to any operation or technical procedure, automated or not, that allows the collection, registration, organization, storage, conservation, elaboration, modification, extraction, consultation, use, blocking, suppression, communication by transfer or by diffusion or any other form of processing that facilitates access, correlation or interconnection of personal data.

s4.title: Information Storage
s4.text: The personal data provided through our website https://www.3rcore.com/ will be stored in data banks called 'Clients' and 'Prospects' for the period indicated in each privacy notice or consent. It is important to highlight that our data banks are duly registered with the General Directorate for the Protection of Personal Data, in accordance with current legislation. Only 3R Core Marketing Agency personnel who need to know such information to send information or respond to requests from data owners may access and manage the personal data provided. This personal data will be treated fairly and legally and will not be used for purposes incompatible with those specified.

s5.title: Exercise of Rights
s5.text: You may exercise your rights of information, access, update, rectification, and deletion of personal data through:
s5.subject: Subject: Personal Data Protection

s6.title: Quality of Personal Data
s6.text: The information required from personal data owners consists of basic contact details, which are relevant, adequate, and proportionate in relation to the purpose for which they are collected. The personal data to which 3R Core Marketing Agency will have access will be those that the owners voluntarily provide in the corresponding forms. To ensure that data owners are aware of this Privacy Policy, 3R Core Marketing Agency provides the necessary technical resources. It is essential that the personal data provided is truthful and up-to-date; otherwise, it will be cancelled. Personal data will be deleted when no longer necessary for the purpose for which it was collected but will be kept for an indefinite period.

FeaturesSection.mainTitle: Let's work together to achieve your goals

committed.title: COMMITTED
committed.description: We maintain constant communication that allows us to stay clear on your requirements and address them as quickly as possible.

creative.title: CREATIVE
creative.description: We turn innovation into efficiency. We present proposals that make a difference and commit not only to reaching your goals but to surpassing them.

professional.title: PROFESSIONAL
professional.description: We are involved from start to finish, providing meticulous pre-production, permanent technical assistance, and deep metrics analysis upon completion to ensure objectives are met.

ServiceAbout.title: We provide you with creative ideas

q1.question: What services does 3RCORE offer?
q1.answer: We offer comprehensive software development solutions, including web development, mobile applications, technology consulting, process automation, and digital transformation for businesses of all sizes.

q2.question: How long does it take to develop a project?
q2.answer: Development time varies depending on project complexity and scope. Small projects can take 4 to 8 weeks, while more complex enterprise solutions may require 3 to 6 months. We always provide a detailed timeline before starting.

q3.question: Do you offer post-launch support?
q3.answer: Yes, we offer ongoing maintenance and support packages that include updates, bug fixes, security monitoring, and technical assistance. Our team is available to ensure your project operates optimally.

q4.question: Do you work with specific technologies?
q4.answer: We work with a wide range of modern technologies including React, Next.js, Node.js, Python, SQL and NoSQL databases, cloud services (AWS, Azure, GCP), and mobile frameworks. We select the best technology based on each project's specific needs.

q5.question: How do you protect my project information?
q5.answer: Security and confidentiality are our priority. We sign non-disclosure agreements (NDA), implement security measures in development, comply with data protection regulations, and use secure private repositories for all source code.

q6.question: What is the process to start a project?
q6.answer: Our process begins with a free initial consultation to understand your needs. Then, we develop a detailed proposal with scope, timeline, and budget. Once approved, we assign a dedicated team and begin with agile development sprints, maintaining constant communication.

contact.title: Still have questions?
contact.description: Our team is ready to help you. Contact us and we will respond shortly.

description.paragraph1: At 3R CORE we help your brand appear in the first Google results, both organically (SEO) and through paid ads (Google Ads). Our goal is simple: for more people to find your business, trust your brand and contact you.
description.paragraph2: We work on positioning from an integral strategy, combining analysis, content, advertising and constant optimization, so that your investment generates real and measurable results

header.subtitle: WHAT WE DO AND WHAT THE SERVICE CONSISTS OF
header.description:
Our SEO and SEM service focuses on achieving visibility, quality traffic, and conversions.
It's not just about appearing on Google, but appearing in front of the right people.
We take care of:

seo.title: SEO
seo.subtitle:
Organic positioning
on Google
seo.description: SEO allows your website to appear naturally on Google when someone searches for your services or products. We work on:
seo.footer: SEO is ideal for building authority, trust, and sustainable results over time.

sem.title: SEM
sem.subtitle: Google Ads Advertising
sem.description: With Google Ads, we achieve immediate results through strategically targeted ads. We handle:
items: Creation and configuration of Google Ads campaigns
Continuous performance improvement of the ads
sem.footer: SEM is ideal if you are looking for fast sales, lead generation, or immediate traffic.

SEOMETO.title: Our working methodology
SEOMETO.subtitle:
At 3R CORE we don't improvise.
We work with a clear and proven methodology:
SEOMETO.step1_desc: We study your business, your website, your market, and your competition.
SEOMETO.step2_desc: We choose keywords, the SEO and/or SEM approach, and the objectives.
SEOMETO.step3_desc: We optimize your website and launch Google campaigns according to the defined strategy.
SEOMETO.step4_desc: We measure results, analyze data, and adjust to improve performance.
SEOMETO.step5_desc: We show you what is working and how your investment is evolving.

WebHero.slogan: We partner with market-leading e-commerce platforms like Shopify and WooCommerce. These solutions provide the scalability, robustness, and flexibility to adapt to any business in record time, accelerating digital market entry and eliminating lengthy implementation cycles.
WebHero.protitle: The best technology for every project
WebHero.prosubtitle: Your site will run at high speed, be secure, easy to maintain, and ready to scale
WebHero.poParraf1: We start with a consultation to deeply understand your business, goals, competition, and budget. Then, we design a clear strategy outlining the site’s structure and functionalities.
WebHero.poParraf2: We create complete visual designs in Figma for your approval before writing a single line of code. Once the design is approved, we develop the site using professional quality standards. We perform exhaustive testing across all browsers and both mobile and desktop devices.
WebHero.poPreg: Shall we discuss your next big step on social media?
WebHero.griPost: Ready to transform your online brand?
WebHero.griParraf: Book your free 30-minute strategy session. We’ll audit your brand, find growth opportunities, and build a roadmap for you.

header.subtitle: TYPES OF WEBSITES
header.description: We design and develop all types of websites tailored to your needs:

landing.title: Landing Pages
landing.description: Optimized landing pages designed to convert visitors into customers, ideal for marketing campaigns and product launches.

info.title: Informational & Corporate Sites
info.description: Professional portals that project your company's image and effectively communicate your services.

Ecomm.title: E-commerce
Ecomm.description: Complete online stores featuring shopping carts, integrated payment gateways, and inventory management.

Elearn.title: E-Learning Platforms
Elearn.description: Online learning systems with course management, student tracking, and educational content.

Servic.title: Service-Based Sites
Servic.description: Websites featuring smart forms, appointment systems, and automated scheduling.

Blogs.title: Blogs & Content Portals
Blogs.description: Platforms optimized for content publishing and distribution.

webFAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions
webFAQ.par: We have been creating websites for over 8 years, with more than 150 successful design and development projects completed. Our team is certified in UX/UI design and modern web development. Satisfaction guaranteed.

q1.question: How long does it take?
q1.answer: Typically 4-12 weeks depending on complexity. We provide clear timelines from the very start.

q2.question: Can I see the design before development?
q2.answer: Absolutely. We create full prototypes in Figma for your approval before development begins. You'll know exactly how your site will look.

q3.question: Can I update the content myself?
q3.answer: Yes, completely. We'll train you on the admin panel so you can easily update text, images, and content.

q4.question: What happens after the launch?
q4.answer: We offer maintenance and support plans. We’re always available for updates, optimizations, and troubleshooting.

q5.question: Is Google ranking (SEO) included?
q5.answer: We deliver your site with basic SEO implemented, optimized for speed and correct technical structure. For advanced SEO services to boost your traffic and ranking, we offer dedicated plans separately.

q6.question: What if I need specific functionalities?
q6.answer: We can design and integrate almost anything: payment gateways, booking systems, CRM integrations, automations, and more.

LandingHero.slogan: Boost your business on Google and attract customers who are actually looking for what you offer
LandingHero.whatsappMessage: Hi, I'm coming from the website, I'd like to schedule a meeting.

FirstLandingSection.heading: Google SEO Positioning for companies seeking real results
FirstLandingSection.description: We improve your website's visibility on Google through a professional SEO strategy, designed to attract qualified traffic and sustainable sales opportunities.

quote.line1: SEO is not advertising or social media
quote.line2: it is a medium-term strategy that builds authority, ranking, and progressive results on Google

SecondLandingSection.title: Why invest in SEO Positioning?
SecondLandingSection.subtitle: We work under a clear, measurable, and results-oriented methodology.

audit.title: SEO Audit & Planning
items: Core keyword analysis for your business
Monthly editorial calendar proposal (8 - 15 optimized titles)

interlinks.title: Interlinking Optimization
items: Authority improvement for key landing pages

scaling.title: SEO Scaling
items: Growth reporting and future action planning

ThirdLandingSection.heading: When do you start seeing results?
ThirdLandingSection.description: SEO is a medium-term strategy. Initial progress is typically observed starting from the third month, depending on the industry, competition, and the initial state of the website.

quote.line1: We work with data, analysis, and constant optimization
quote.line2: we do not promise immediate rankings or unrealistic results

FourthLandingSection.heading: SEO success stories
FourthLandingSection.description: We have implemented SEO strategies for various industries, achieving top rankings for key searches such as:

successCases.case2: As de Oros - Casino and entertainment

quote.line1: Every project begins with a real analysis
quote.line2: and a personalized strategy tailored to the business

FiveLandingSection.heading: SEO Service Investment
FiveLandingSection.description: This service includes audit, planning, optimization, scaling, and monthly reporting.

pricing.label: Monthly Investment
pricing.footer: It is a continuous strategy focused on sustainable results.

SixLandingSection.heading: Is your business ready to rank on Google?
SixLandingSection.description:
If you are looking for immediate results, this service is not for you.
If you are looking to build a solid digital presence and consistent traffic, we can help.
